description: Set IsDisabled, and Password properties of a SQL Login

instance_name.description: Instance that has the login to be modified. Leave blank for default instance.

login_name.description: Name of the login to modify. Matches are exact only by default.

fuzzy_match.description: Allow -match operator matches on $login_name so that inputs like 'sql' will match any login with 'sql' anywhere in the name.

enabled.description: Enable or disable an account. Set this to false to disable the account.

password.description: The password to set for an account.
